text: Glenn Alfred Beckert (October 12, 1940 â€“ April 12, 2020) was an American professional baseball player. He played in Major League Baseball as a second baseman for the Chicago Cubs for nine seasons from 1965 to 1973. He ended his career with the San Diego Padres in 1975. He was born in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania. Beckert died on April 12, 2020 in Florida at the age of 79. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1940 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Sportspeople from Pittsburgh Category:Chicago Cubs players Category:San Diego Padres players
title: Glenn Beckert
